column1: Accordingly,  the  Supreme  Court  held  that  the  succeeding  Judge  can
proceed with the case adopting the evidence taken by his predecessor
even  without  recording  the  adoption  of  evidence  when  there  is  no
demand by an accused person to resummon and rehear the witnesses.
